<iframe src="widget.html?prompt_id=777-1757780259" width="100%" height="800" style="border:none;"></iframe>
<script>
  window.addEventListener('message', function(event) {
    // Check if the message is the one we expect
    if (event.data && event.data.type === 'setIframeHeight') {
      // Find all iframes on the page
      const iframes = document.querySelectorAll('iframe');
      // Loop through them to find which one sent the message
      for (let iframe of iframes) {
        // event.source is the window object of the sending iframe.
        // We match it with the iframe element's contentWindow.
        if (iframe.contentWindow === event.source) {
          // We found the correct iframe, now set its height
          iframe.style.height = (event.data.height + 20) + 'px';
          // Break the loop since we found our match
          break; 
        }
      }
    }
  });
</script>
